channel.title: Why can people mage others in a safe zone?
channel.description: Ok i'm using richscape v5 and you can't attack people when there in a safe zone, but if someones in the wild and another persons in a safe zone then you can use like, Ice Blitz on them and hit them........How can I fix this?????

item.title: Why can people mage others in a safe zone?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok i’m using richscape v5 and you can’t attack people when there in a safe zone, but if someones in the wild and another persons in a safe zone then you can use like, Ice Blitz on them and hit them…How can I fix this???

Read full topic
item.source: Why can people mage others in a safe zone?
